thread.section_title: LensFactory Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensFactory | lensfactory.com
thread.title: Evalyne

author: Evalyne
title: Evalyne
text: Had a pair of frames that needed to have lenses. I did not want to pay as much as my eye doctor charges so I found lense factory. The choices are great. I mailed glasses with Rx and received them back in less than two weeks. The quality of the lenses are just as good as what I would get from the eye doctor. I absolutely love my glasses. I will buy from lens factory again.
